gobblin.runtime.embedded

Class EmbeddedGobblinDistcp

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.embedded.EmbeddedGobblin
      • gobblin.runtime.embedded.EmbeddedGobblinDistcp

  • public class EmbeddedGobblinDistcp
extends EmbeddedGobblin
    Embedded version of distcp. Usage: new EmbeddedGobblinDistcp(new Path("/source"), new Path("/dest")).run();

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EmbeddedGobblinDistcp.CliFactory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmbeddedGobblinDistcp delete()
      Specifies that files in the target that don't exist in the source should be deleted.
      EmbeddedGobblinDistcp deleteEmptyParentDirectories()
      If delete() is used, specifies that newly empty parent directories should also be deleted.
      EmbeddedGobblin setTemplate(String templateURI) 
      EmbeddedGobblinDistcp simulate()
      Run in simulate mode.
      EmbeddedGobblinDistcp update()
      Specifies that files in the target should be updated if they have changed in the source.

      • EmbeddedGobblinDistcp

                      throws JobTemplate.TemplateException,

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public EmbeddedGobblinDistcp update()
        Specifies that files in the target should be updated if they have changed in the source. Equivalent to -update option in Hadoop distcp.

      • delete

        public EmbeddedGobblinDistcp delete()
        Specifies that files in the target that don't exist in the source should be deleted. Equivalent to -delete option in Hadoop distcp.

      • deleteEmptyParentDirectories

        public EmbeddedGobblinDistcp deleteEmptyParentDirectories()
        If delete() is used, specifies that newly empty parent directories should also be deleted.

      • simulate

        public EmbeddedGobblinDistcp simulate()
        Run in simulate mode. Will log everythin it would copy, but not actually copy anything.

      • setTemplate

        public EmbeddedGobblin setTemplate(String templateURI)
                            throws URISyntaxException,
                                   SpecNotFoundException,
                                   JobTemplate.TemplateException

        setTemplate in class EmbeddedGobblin
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException
        SpecNotFoundException
        JobTemplate.TemplateException
